question_text: A jar has 310 buttons, and 20% of these buttons are green. How many buttons in the jar are green?
subject: Math

question_text: The solution to a system of linear equations is (5, 5). Which of the following could be the graph of the equations in the system?
explanation: The two lines intersect at (5, 5), which is the solution to the system.
image_caption: Graph showing two lines intersecting at (5,5)
subject: Math
